bill.summary: 2/25/1988--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1987 regarding contributions by the United States Postal Service to the Employees Health Benefits Fund in FY 1988 and 1989 by removing provisions with respect to limitations, implementation plans, progress reports and compliance.
